com.xhSmart.controller
类 UserController

java.lang.Object

@Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/user")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object

lin

logout

@RequestMapping(value="/logout")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView logout(int id,
                                                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
注销登陆，销毁session

参数：
id - 用户id
request - Request对象
返回：
ModelAndView

@RequestMapping(value="/login")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView login(User user,
                                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

public void getUserByDepartment(int id,

public void delUser(int id,
                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)

id - 用户id
request - Request对象

changeState

@RequestMapping(value="/changeState")
public void changeState(int id,
                                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)

request - Request对象
